definition: Nujiang river of south Tibet and northwest Yunnan, the upper reaches of Salween river 薩爾溫江|萨尔温江, forming border of Myanmar and Thailand
anger/fury/flourishing/vigorous
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang
abbr. for 怒江傈僳族自治州, Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture in northwest Yunnan, capital Liuku or Lutku 六庫鎮|六库镇[Liu4 ku4 zhen4]

definition: Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture in northwest Yunnan, capital Liuku or Lutku 六庫鎮|六库镇[Liu4 ku4 zhen4]
pinyin: Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: the Grand Canyon of the Nujiang river in Tibet and Yunnan

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面临着水土流失和新建大坝的双重威胁。

sentences.english: The still free-flowing Nu, or Salween, River will have as many as 13 dams.
sentences.chinese: 现在还是无坝河流的怒江，将要建设13坐水坝。

sentences.english: The fast-flowing Nu offers vast potential for hydropower.
sentences.chinese: 快速奔流的怒江有巨大的水电潜力。

sentences.english: The study area is located in the Nujiang River Basin of Yunnan, where is seriously suffering from debris flow hazards.
sentences.chinese: 研究区选择在遭受泥石流危害严重的云南怒江流域。

sentences.english: The Shipiao Hot Spring is the most wondrous natural bath pool in Nujiang Gorge.
sentences.chinese: 石瓢温泉是怒江峡谷中最神奇的天然澡塘。

sentences.english: The Nujiang is called The Angry River.
sentences.chinese: 怒江之名意为愤怒的河流。

sentences.english: Where war in Nujiang River has sell?
Has taken part in the assessment of the Liuku Reservoir of Nujiang River (mainly the zoobenthos).
sentences.chinese: 曾参与建设怒江六库水电站的环境评估，负责部分。

sentences.english: Nu River, September, chrysanthemum fragrance still.
sentences.chinese: 怒江，九月，菊花的清香还在。

sentences.english: If you visit the River Nu, you will meet some Nu people who are good at both singing and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去怒江旅游，就能看到能歌善舞的怒族人。

sentences.english: For years power companies have longed to dam the Nu River, which flows flat and olive drab below the fields where Yu and his family earn $1,200 a year growing corn, rice and strawberries.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，电力公司渴望在怒江建大坝。

sentences.english: The family of Da Mashi (Nu ethnic group) has lived on the cliff of Nujiang for 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 怒族打马石家在怒江的悬崖之上住了一百年。

definition: Dulong river in northwest Yunnan on border with Myanmar, tributary of Salween or Nujiang 怒江, sometimes referred to as number four of Three parallel rivers 三江並流|三江并流, wildlife protection unit
